channel.title: C# Dowloading file error

item.title: C# Dowloading file error
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
This means user not logged into application. So, make sure to put download function after login, or if you want file to be able to be downloaded before logging in, edit file on KeyAuth dashboard and uncheck authed option.

Read full topic

item.title: C# Dowloading file error
item.dc:creator: lucidwin
item.description:
Hello, i have issues when adding KeyAuthApp.download(“id”); to my source. I copied the full code but it doesnt download the file that i want, when i am adding: if (!KeyAuthApp.response.success)
{
Console.WriteLine("\n Status: " + KeyAuthApp.response.message);
Thread.Sleep(1500);
Environment.Exit(0);
}
else…
it says session not validated and if not, nothing happens. Please help me

Read full topic
